name: Crown Jewel Holiday Cocktail
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'whiskey'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'eggnog'}, {'quantity': '1/2', 'unit': 'luid ounc', 'name': 'triple sec'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'cinnamon stick or orange twist'}
steps: Add whiskey, eggnog, and orange liqueur to a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake well.. Pour into a frosted martini glass and garnish with a cinnamon stick or orange twist.

name: Rich Almond Milk Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': None, 'name': 'duck egg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vanilla almond milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '1/4', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons non-dairy', 'name': 'whipped topping'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'nutmeg'}
steps: Crack duck egg into a glass bowl. Using an electric wire whip, whip egg until yellow and frothy. Add almond milk, sugar, and vanilla; whip until combined.. Divide beverage between two cups. Garnish with non-dairy whipped topping and freshly grated nutmeg. Serve immediately.

name: Ponche de Crème (Trinidad's Eggnog)
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'grated lime zest'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '(14 ounce) cans', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'canned evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'aromatic bitters'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'freshly grated nutmeg'}
steps: Beat eggs and lime zest in a large bowl using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Gradually pour in condensed milk while continuing to mix, and then pour in evaporated milk.. Stir in rum and bitters and sprinkle with nutmeg. Transfer to a bottle and chill for at least 1 hour before serving.. Serve over crushed ice.

name: Amazingly Good Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'vanilla extract, divided'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': None, 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'light cream'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'light rum (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}

name: Eggnog Milkshake
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'eggnog'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'butter pecan ice cream'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': '1% milk'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whipped cream as topping (optional)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon'}
steps: Combine eggnog, ice cream, and milk in a blender. Blend on high until incorporated. Pour into a glass, garnish with whipped cream, and dust with cinnamon if desired.

name: Peppermint Eggnog Milkshake
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'eggnog'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'vanilla ice cream'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'peppermint extract'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whipped cream (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'crushed peppermint (Optional)'}
steps: Combine eggnog, vanilla ice cream, and peppermint extract in a blender, blend until smooth.. Pour milkshake into a glass and garnish with whipped cream and crushed peppermint. Serve immediately.

name: Chocolate Eggnog Milkshake
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'low-fat vanilla ice cream'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'low-fat eggnog'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chocolate syrup, plus more for garnish'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whipped cream (optional)'}
steps: Combine ice cream, eggnog, and 2 tablespoons of chocolate syrup in a blender, and process until well-combined.. Drizzle some chocolate syrup down the sides of the glass in a random pattern, and pour in the milkshake. Top with whipped cream, if desired.

name: Coquito
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'egg yolks, beaten'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'cream of coconut'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}

name: Easiest Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '2 ⅓', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'low-fat milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Blend milk, eggs, sugar, vanilla, and nutmeg together in a large pitcher until well combined.. Chill in the refrigerator before serving.

name: Eggnog (Spiked with Rum)
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar, divided'}, {'quantity': '16', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'dark rum (such as Captain Morgan® Spiced Rum)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'half-and-half'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Mix egg yolks, 2 cups sugar, rum, and nutmeg together in a large bowl. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate 8 hours to overnight to "cure.". Beat egg whites and remaining 1 cup sugar in a bowl using an electric mixer until firm peaks form.. Fold in heavy cream. Fold in the egg yolk mixture. Beat in half-and-half until well combined.. Pour into lidded jars or containers, refrigerate, and shake before serving.

name: "Egg Not" (Eggless Eggnog)
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk, divided'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3.4 ounce) package', 'name': 'instant vanilla pudding mix'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'rum-flavored extract'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground allspice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground ginger'}
steps: Blend 2 cups milk, sugar, pudding mix, rum-flavored extract, nutmeg, allspice, and ginger in a blender on medium-high speed until smooth; pour into a pitcher. Stir remaining 3 cups milk into mixture. Refrigerate eggnog until thickened, at least 1 hour. Stir well before serving.

name: Traditional Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg, divided'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy, chilled'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': "spiced rum (such as Captain Morgan's®)"}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Beat eggs with an electric mixer on medium speed until very frothy, 2 to 3 minutes.. Gradually beat in sugar, vanilla extract, and 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg.. Stir in cream, milk, brandy, and rum.. Cover and chill before serving. Sprinkle individual servings with remaining nutmeg.

name: Chef John's Homemade Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'freshly grated nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'bourbon whiskey, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg whites'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'freshly grated nutmeg'}
steps: Place egg yolks in a saucepan. Whisk in sugar until well blended and creamy. Add milk and cream; whisk until blended. Place pan over medium heat; whisk frequently until mixture reaches a temperature of between 170 to 180 degrees F (75 to 80 degrees C) using an instant-read thermometer. Remove from heat. Stir in nutmeg and whiskey.. Chill pan in cold water until cool. Transfer mixture to a container (a large pitcher is ideal). Cover and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled, 2 to 3 hours.. Place egg whites in a bowl and whisk until soft peaks form. Add sugar and continue whisking until egg whites hold a firmer peak. Whisk egg whites into custard base until thoroughly blended. Refrigerate until chilled, about 30 minutes.. Whisk eggnog again just before serving and between each pour to ensure even distribution of the egg whites which tend to float to the top. Serve with a dusting of nutmeg.

name: Tom and Jerry Mix
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': "confectioners' sugar"}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound unsalted b', 'name': 'utter'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground mace'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground allspice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cardamom'}
steps: Beat sugar and butter together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth. Add egg yolks, one at a time, beating well after each addition.. Beat egg whites in a separate large glass or metal mixing bowl until foamy; continue to beat until soft peaks form. (Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form soft mounds rather than a sharp peak.) Stir egg whites into egg yolk mixture. Stir in salt, mace, allspice, cloves, nutmeg, and cardamom.. To use the mixture, combine 1 cup hot milk and 1 ounce rum in a mug. Stir in 1 tablespoon Tom and Jerry mix.

name: Spiked Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cold eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold milk'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cold brandy'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cold spiced rum'}
steps: Beat eggs in a bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed until very frothy, 2 to 3 minutes. Add 1 cup plus 1 tablespoon sugar, vanilla extract, and nutmeg gradually while beating. Turn the mixer off and manually stir in whipping cream, milk, brandy, and spiced rum. Chill before serving.

name: Eggnog Hot Chocolate
ingredients: {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'bittersweet chocolate chips'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'eggnog'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'coffee flavored liqueur'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whipped cream'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks, garnish'}
steps: Melt milk with chocolate in a medium saucepan over medium-low heat. Remove from heat and let stand for 2 minutes. Whisk mixture until melted and smooth.. Stir in eggnog. Heat gently over low heat until very warm but not boiling. Remove from heat; stir in vanilla and coffee liqueur.. Pour into mugs. Serve topped with whipped cream and a cinnamon stick garnish.

name: Jack Daniel's Very Merry Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dark rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'bourbon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'eggs'}
steps: Mix sugar, rum, bourbon, brandy, vanilla, nutmeg, and salt in a blender on medium speed until combined. Transfer to a large bowl.. Pour half-and-half, cream, and eggs into the blender; mix on low speed until combined. Carefully pour into the liquor mixture and stir to combine.. Ladle combined mixture back into the blender in batches; blend on low speed. Transfer blended eggnog to a punch bowl or pitcher.. Refrigerate eggnog until cold, 1 to 2 hours, before serving.

name: Homemade Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'whipped cream, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}
steps: Cream egg yolks and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Set aside.. Combine milk, whipping cream, and nutmeg in a large saucepan. Cook over medium heat until mixture just begins to simmer with 1 to 2 bubbles every 2 to 3 seconds, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat.. Add a very small amount of hot milk mixture into egg yolk mixture while constantly whisking eggs. Continue adding small amounts of milk mixture, whisking until all has been added; transfer eggnog back into saucepan. Continue to cook over medium heat, constantly whisking, until liquid reaches 160 degrees F (70 degrees C). Pour eggnog into a large pitcher, cover, and refrigerate 6 hours to overnight.. Blend cooled eggnog with an immersion blender until no lumps remain, about 1 minute. Ladle into 7 cups and top each with a dollop of whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon.

name: Amaretto Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'eggnog'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1.5 fluid ounce) jigger', 'name': 'amaretto liqueur'}
steps: Pour eggnog into a microwave-safe mug. Heat in the microwave until warmed through, 30 seconds to 1 minute. Stir in amaretto liqueur.

name: Christmas Creamy Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(5 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '4 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg whites'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fluid ounce', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: In a large mixing bowl, beat egg yolks until they are thickened and light. Gradually stir in condensed milk, sugar, vanilla, and milk. Beat egg whites until stiff, then add them to milk mixture. Stir rum into mixture to taste. Garnish with nutmeg.

name: Rompope (Mexican Eggnog)
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pints', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '15', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}
steps: Bring milk, sugar, and cinnamon sticks to a boil in a large saucepan over low heat. Continue to boil, stirring constantly, until milk has reduced by a little more than one-third, about 20 minutes. Remove from the heat. Leave in the saucepan and allow to cool slightly, about 10 minutes.. Beat egg yolks with an electric mixer until thick and pale. Mix in a little of the warm milk mixture. Pour egg yolk mixture into the saucepan with the remaining milk mixture. Stir to combine and bring to a boil over low heat. Stir constantly, scraping the bottom and sides, until mixture is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon, 5 to 7 minutes.. Remove from the heat, remove cinnamon sticks, and cool to lukewarm, 15 to 30 minutes. Stir in rum and cool completely, about 2 hours.

name: Early American Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sherry wine'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Jamaican rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whiskey'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'vanilla ice cream, for serving'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'freshly grated ground nutmeg, for garnish'}
steps: Add brandy, sherry, rum, and whiskey to a bowl.. Place egg yolks and egg whites into two separate, large mixing bowls. Set egg whites aside. Beat egg yolks with an electric mixer until light and frothy; gradually beat in sugar until light colored. Slowly beat in brandy mixture. With the mixer running, add milk and heavy cream until thoroughly blended. Using a clean beater, beat egg whites until soft peaks form; gently fold into milk mixture.. Pour eggnog into two clean, gallon-size plastic milk containers. Refrigerate at least 5 days (10 days for a smoother taste). Shake containers occasionally to keep alcohol from separating.. Pour eggnog into a punch bowl; whisk to blend. Add vanilla ice cream; garnish with nutmeg.

name: Vitamix Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Whip eggs, sugar, and rum in high-powered blender on High until a thick custard forms, about 4 minutes.. Pour milk and add nutmeg to custard; blend on Medium until well-mixed, about 2 minutes. Increase the speed to High for 1 minute.. Chill for 4 hours before serving.

name: Eggnog from Scratch
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'jumbo', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'granulated sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'liter', 'name': 'spiced rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'heavy cream, lightly whipped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}
steps: Beat egg yolks in a large mixing bowl. Gradually add sugar. Beat until mixture thickens. Stir in milk and rum. Pour into a large punch bowl and chill for 3 to 4 hours.. Fold in lightly whipped heavy cream with vanilla before serving.

name: Basic Coquito
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'cream of coconut, shaken very well before opening'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'coconut milk, shaken very well before opening'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rum (such as Bacardi®), or to taste'}
steps: Add cinnamon to a large bottle or other container that can hold at least 8 cups using a funnel. Pour sweetened condensed milk, cream of coconut, coconut milk, evaporated milk, and rum through the funnel. Shake or stir well to combine.. Refrigerate coquito until chilled, at least 1 hour. Shake or stir before serving.

name: Coquito de Puerto Rico
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'cream of coconut'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 ounce) can', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'coconut-flavored rum (such as Bacardi®)'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'scoop', 'name': 'vanilla bean ice cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cinnamon sticks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Place cream of coconut, condensed milk, evaporated milk, coconut rum, water, ice cream, and vanilla extract in a blender. Blend until smooth and well-combined, about 3 minutes.. Pour coconut mixture into two 20-ounce glass bottles or jars. Add 1 cinnamon stick and 1 clove to each container; shake well. Chill coquito 8 hours to overnight.. Shake container before pouring coquito into shot glasses or small cups. Sprinkle cinnamon or nutmeg on top before serving.

name: Eggnog I
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}
steps: Beat eggs; mix in condensed milk, vanilla, quart of milk and salt.. Beat the whipping cream until soft peaks form. Fold in to egg and milk mixture and sprinkle with nutmeg. Serve chilled.

name: Tom and Jerry
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': "confectioners' sugar"}, {'quantity': '20', 'unit': 'fluid ounces', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '24', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Separate the eggs. In a large bowl beat the egg whites until frothy. Whisk in 3/4 cup of the confectioners' sugar and beat until stiff peaks are formed.. Beat the egg yolks with the remaining 1/2 cup of confectioners' sugar and about 4 to 5 tablespoons of the brandy until light and lemon colored. Fold the egg whites into the egg yolks and refrigerate.. In a large stock pot heat the milk until hot but do not boil. Reduce heat and keep milk hot.. To each mug add 2 tablespoons brandy (or more to taste) and 1 large heaping tablespoon of egg mixture. Stir and fill mug with hot milk. Place another tablespoon of egg mixture on top and sprinkle with nutmeg.

name: Creme de Vie
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sugar'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(14 ounce) can', 'name': 'sweetened condensed milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}
steps: In a saucepan, combine water and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for 3 minutes.. Place egg yolks in a blender and process on high speed. Slowly pour in the hot sugar water while blending (pouring too fast might curdle the yolks.) Add condensed milk, rum and vanilla. Blend until smooth. Chill in refrigerator.

name: Costco's $9 Eggnog Wine Is Already the Hit of the Holidays
Jim Beam® Yule Nog
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '2 parts Jim Beam® Bourbon'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '1 part DeKuyper® Buttershots® Schnapps'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': '4 parts Eggnog'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Fresh Ground Nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'Ice'}
steps: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.. Garnish with a dusting of fresh ground nutmeg.

name: Eggnog Extreme
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'white rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'half-and-half cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg whites'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: In a large bowl, combine egg yolks, 2 cups sugar and rum. Mix well, cover and refrigerate for 24 hours.. Stir half-and-half into cooled yolk mixture. In a large bowl, whip the heavy cream until soft peaks form; set aside.. In a separate clean bowl, with a clean whisk, whip egg whites until thick, then gradually add sugar and whip until peaks form. Fold the whipped cream into the egg whites, then fold into the yolks mixture. Sprinkle top with nutmeg.

name: Betty's Famous Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '4 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'bourbon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '(750 milliliter) bottle', 'name': 'dark rum'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'half-and-half (or whole milk)'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'brandy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg, for garnish'}
steps: Beat the eggs and sugar together in a very large bowl until thick and light-colored. Stir in the bourbon and rum, mixing until sugar has dissolved. Let stand about 1 hour.. Meanwhile, whip the egg whites in a separate bowl until stiff peaks form.. Stir the whipping cream and half and half into the egg yolk mixture until thoroughly blended. Slowly stir in the brandy. Fold in the egg whites, blending evenly. Cover and refrigerate two hours before serving. May be stored in the refrigerator up to one week.. Serve in small cups or glasses dusted with a pinch of nutmeg.

name: Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'whiskey'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg whites'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: In a large bowl, blend the milk, cream, egg yolks, vanilla and whiskey using a hand mixer until smooth and creamy. In a separate bowl, whip egg whites until soft peaks form. Gradually sprinkle in the sugar while continuing to whip until stiff. Fold the egg whites into the egg yolk mixture, and pour into a punch bowl or large pitcher. Serve in mugs or cups garnished with a sprinkle of nutmeg.

name: Mom's Best Spiced Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon, divided'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground allspice'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'half-and-half'}
steps: Combine sugar, 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice in a bowl.. Whip egg whites with an electric mixer on high speed until soft peaks form. Reduce speed to medium and beat, gradually adding 1/2 of sugar mixture, until stiff peaks form.. Beat egg yolks in a separate bowl until thick and lemon colored. Mix remaining sugar mixture into the yolks. Fold yolk mixture into the egg whites. Add milk and half-and-half; combine gently. Garnish with remaining cinnamon.

name: Root Beer Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, beaten'}, {'quantity': '4 ⅔', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '7', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'French vanilla-flavored coffee creamer'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'root beer concentrate'}
steps: Beat eggs in a pitcher until light and fluffy. Add milk, sugar, coffee creamer, vanilla extract, and nutmeg to eggs; beat until smooth. Refrigerate until slightly chilled, at least 15 minutes.. Stir root beer extract into egg mixture.

name: Pumpkin Pie Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(15 ounce) can', 'name': 'pumpkin puree'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'light brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maple syrup'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'pumpkin pie spice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'brandy, or as needed'}
steps: Place egg yolks in a large bowl and beat using an electric blender until pale yellow, about 5 minutes. Add whipping cream and vanilla extract; mix until well combined.. Combine pumpkin puree, brown sugar, white sugar, maple syrup, evaporated milk, pumpkin pie spice, cinnamon, and salt in a saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir until sugars are dissolved, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Stir in milk and mix until well combined.. Slowly pour pumpkin mixture into the egg mixture and stir together until well combined. Pour eggnog through a wire-mesh strainer into a container and refrigerate overnight. Pour 1 tablespoon brandy into each cup of eggnog.

name: Eggnog Blend
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '11', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks, beaten'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'heavy cream'}, {'quantity': '⅔', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dark rum'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'Scotch whiskey'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'vanilla ice cream'}
steps: In a saucepan over low heat, stir together the half-and-half and sugar. Whisk in egg yolks and cook until light custard forms; do not boil. Remove from heat and cool, then place in refrigerator and chill overnight.. Into the chilled mixture, stir in vanilla, cream, dark rum, scotch, and vanilla ice cream. Serve cold.

name: Ultimate One-Cup-Only Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1 ¾', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'quarts', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dark rum (such as Bacardi®)'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cognac'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}
steps: Beat egg yolks and sugar together in a large bowl until pale yellow; stir in cream, rum, cognac, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.

name: Brad's Killer Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, separated'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'white sugar, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ice cubes'}
steps: Beat egg whites in a glass, metal, or ceramic bowl until foamy. Add 1 cup sugar gradually, continuing to beat until stiff peaks form. Lift your beater or whisk straight up: the egg whites will form sharp peaks.. Beat egg yolks and remaining 1 cup sugar in a separate bowl until frothy and lightened in color.. Fold egg whites into egg yolk mixture gently; pour into a large punch bowl or pitcher. Stir in rum, half-and-half, and milk.. Top eggnog with nutmeg; serve with ice.

name: Coquito Coconut Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'unsweetened coconut milk'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'unsweetened almond milk'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(15 ounce) cans', 'name': 'cream of coconut'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'Puerto Rican white rum, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'turbinado sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'honey'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}
steps: Pour coconut milk, almond milk, cream of coconut, rum, eggs, sugar, honey, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves into a large bowl and whisk well to combine.. Blend mixture in two batches in a blender on high speed until frothy, 3 to 4 minutes. Pour into a gallon-size glass container and chill overnight or serve over ice.

name: Virginia Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'rum'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whisky'}
steps: Beat sugar and egg yolks together in a bowl using an electric mixer until very light in color. Mix milk and cream into yolk mixture.. Beat egg whites in a separate bowl using an electric mixer until stiff peaks form, adding more sugar, if desired. Fold egg whites into milk mixture until eggnog is smooth. Stir rum and whisky into eggnog. Refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.

name: Eggless Vanilla Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'skim milk, divided'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 ounce) package', 'name': 'instant sugar-free vanilla pudding mix'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'egg substitute'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: In a medium bowl combine 2 cups milk and pudding mixture; stir well until thickened.. To the pudding add remaining 2 cups milk and egg substitute; mix well. Stir in vanilla extract, salt and nutmeg until well blended and coats a spoon.. Refrigerate overnight.

name: Overnight Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}, {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cane sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pint', 'name': 'whipping cream'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}
steps: Combine milk, cinnamon, vanilla, and cloves in a medium pot over medium-high heat. Cook, stirring every so often, until spices become one with the milk, 3 to 5 minutes. Be sure to stir from the bottom of the pot so the milk doesn't burn.. Meanwhile, whisk egg yolks and cane sugar together in a large mixing bowl until pale yellow, thick, and smooth.. Remove milk mixture from the stove. Pour some of the hot milk into the egg yolk mixture, whisking quickly to avoid scrambling the eggs. Continue, pouring a little bit at a time and whisking, until all has been added.. Pour the mixture back into the pot and place over medium heat. Stir constantly with a spatula until eggnog thickens and becomes light beige in color, about 5 minutes; it should leave a slight film on the spatula. Remove from the heat.. Pour whipping cream and nutmeg into a pitcher. Pour eggnog mixture into the whipping cream and mix with the spatula to combine. Place in the refrigerator, 8 hours to overnight for best enjoyment. Stir before serving.

name: Knifton Christmas Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'frozen orange juice concentrate'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground ginger'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'vanilla ice cream'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'orange sherbet'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'liters', 'name': 'ginger ale'}
steps: Place orange juice concentrate, lemon juice, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves, nutmeg, and eggs in a blender; blend until smooth. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Pour egg mixture into a large punch bowl. Stir in water. Drop ice cream and sherbet in then top with the ginger ale.

name: Satisfying Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'nonfat milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(12 fluid ounce) can', 'name': 'evaporated milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'granular sucralose sweetener (such as Splenda®)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg yolks'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'vanilla extract'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dark rum, or to taste'}
steps: Whisk together the nonfat milk, evaporated milk, sucralose sweetener, nutmeg, and egg yolks in a heavy saucepan. Warm over very low heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture reaches 160 degrees F (70 degrees C), about 10 minutes. Pour the eggnog through a strainer. Stir in vanilla extract. Refrigerate until chilled, about 2 hours.. Just before serving, stir in dark rum, if using.

name: Sugar Free Eggnog
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 ounce) package', 'name': 'sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'nonfat milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'packet', 'name': 'aspartame sweetener'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'rum flavored extract'}
steps: In a large mixing bowl, mix together sugar free vanilla pudding mix, nonfat milk, sweetener, ground cinnamon, dash of nutmeg , and rum extract. Mix these very well with a wire whisk for at least 2 minutes. If this is too thick, add more milk and sweetener.
